question: Can you help me understand how solar panels work and generate an image of a modern solar panel?
true_answer: Solar panels work by allowing photons, or particles of light, to knock electrons free from atoms, generating a flow of electricity. Image of a modern solar panel generated.

steps.content: Can you help me understand how solar panels work and generate an image of a modern solar panel?
Plan: 1) Search for information on how solar panels work. 2) Generate an image of a modern solar panel. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for information on how solar panels work.
Solar panels work by allowing photons, or particles of light, to knock electrons free from atoms, generating a flow of electricity.
Generating an image of a modern solar panel.
Image of a modern solar panel generated.
Does the type of material used in the panel affect its efficiency?
Plan: 1) Search for information on how different materials affect the efficiency of solar panels.
Searching for information on the impact of material type on solar panel efficiency.
The efficiency of solar panels can be affected by the type of material used, with monocrystalline panels generally being more efficient than polycrystalline panels.
